name: .REAL File Extension
summary: Learn about .REAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a REAL file in Adobe Aero (iOS, macOS, Windows). To open a REAL file in Adobe Aero for iOS, go to the app's Home screen, select the Import and Open button, and then navigate to and open your REAL file. To open a REAL file in Adobe Aero for macOS and Windows, select File â†’ Import from the program's menu bar, and then navigate to and open your REAL file.
